Q27: For each of the following statements, can you tell me how strongly you agree or disagree? One of my main goals in life has been to make my parents proud.

Q29: For each of the following statements, can you tell me how strongly you agree or disagree? On the whole, men make better political leaders than women do.
Q30: For each of the following statements, can you tell me how strongly you agree or disagree? A university education is more important for a boy than for a girl.
